name: Statue
description:
Our (@maccier an myself) entry game for the Emotional Gamejam 2019 entry !

Quite changed from the initial idea, and a bit rushed in the end, things might feel a bit unpolished.

KNOWN ISSUES :
- On the "3rd stage" you have some random"rollback", be perseverant, think that the entity speaking to you move you back for fun.


SPOIL :
The "on the ruins of the past" is represented by some... ruins, and the "entropy" the changes happening the more you advance in the story, while staying at the same place.
